s2.ptxt: Install the No. 2 radio bracket to the radio receiver with the 3 screws.
Install the No. 1 radio bracket to the radio receiver with the 3 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL RADIO RECEIVER ASSEMBLY WITH BRACKET

s2.ptxt: Install the radio receiver assembly with bracket with the 4 screws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL CENTER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL ASSEMBLY

s3.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws to connect the air conditioning control.
Attach the 9 claws to install the center instrument cluster finish panel.
Attach the 9 claws to install the center instrument cluster finish panel.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL CENTER LOWER INSTRUMENT CLUSTER FINISH PANEL

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 claws and 2 clips to install the center lower instrument cluster finish panel.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

atten3.ptxt: When disconnecting the cable, some systems need to be initialized after the cable is reconnected (See page ).
